articles.title: Co-worker of slain ‘General Hospital’ actor speaks out: ‘Felt completely helpless’ - Good Morning America
articles.description: Anita Joy, a co-worker and friend of the late actor Johnny Wactor, recalls his final moments after he was shot and killed on May 25.
articles.content:
The co-worker and friend who was with Johnny Wactor when the former "General Hospital" actor was shot and killed is speaking for the first time about the tragic night.
